description:
A light and refined jersey that uses 3 different materials to help keep you cool. Part of Craft’s Core line, the Essence jersey is at home on weekend tours, club rides, or your first Gran Fondo.

  • Light polyester materials wick moisture
  • Body mapped construction puts breathable material where you it
  • Made using a solution dye process that uses 75% less water and 39% less energy than standard dying
  • Full length zipper offers easy venting
  • 3 back drop-in pockets fit a light windbreaker, some tools and a handful of gels
  • Dropped hem provides coverage
  • Silicone grips at back hem keep the jersey in place
  • Craft fit is long and lean. If you fall between sizes, Craft suggests sizing up
name: Craft Essence Jersey - Men's
